chapter.title: Software Repository
chapter.para: Please see the original documentation ( for a detailed description of the Software Repository and its package handling mechanisms.

sect1.title: Summary of Changes
sect1.para:
Here is a list of changes made to Software Repository component:
New package type module was introduced, representing a package that contains a pluggable module. More about pluggable modules (and their packaging) you can find in .
Support for searching pluggable modules by interface they provide was added. This feature is utilized in Benchmark Manager. More on pluggable module provided interfaces you can find in .
